entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , London
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:28 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Drizzle, 4.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: London Int'l Airport 2:29 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023
Condition: Light Drizzle
Temperature: 4.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa falling
Visibility: 8.1 km
Humidity: 96 %
Dewpoint: 3.8°C
Wind: E 28 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Tuesday: Rain. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Rain. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High plus 4. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few showers. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: Showers. Risk of thunderstorms this evening and after midnight. Fog patches. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023
